title: Hip Cuisine
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Raw, Juice bar, Fusion, Latin American, Panamanian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. With an outlet in Balboa as well this one in Clayton. Health food restaurant inside  shopping center. Offers salads, entrees, build-yo-own bowl, and sushi; also smoothies and juices. Sample vegan choices include vegan tartare, stuffed mushrooms, vegan tacos, stuffed plantains, and minestrone soup.
streetAddress: Clayton Mall en Calle al Hospital
